mapper.select: SELECT pf.client_id AS clientId, pf.pharm_id AS pharmId, p.pharm_name AS pharmName, p.pharm_address AS pharmAddress, p.pharm_tel AS pharmTel FROM pharm_favorite pf JOIN pharm_info p ON pf.pharm_id = p.pharm_id WHERE pf.client_id = #{clientId}

SELECT hf.client_id AS clientId, hf.hosp_id AS hospId, h.hosp_name AS hospName, h.hosp_address AS hospAddress, h.hosp_tel AS hospTel FROM hosp_favorite hf JOIN hosp_info h ON hf.hosp_id = h.hosp_id WHERE hf.client_id = #{clientId}
